entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then cloudy. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 26 January 2023
